next_actions: Decide whether to redefine the H3 confirmatory contrasts (e.g., shift to ≥$10M) now that the country-cluster bootstrap shows near-zero slopes at ≥$100k/≥$1MM, and update the PAP addendum accordingly.

Build manuscript-ready visuals/tables for the H4 religiosity × class interaction and test robustness to richer covariates (current class, religiosity dummies) before proposing a confirmatory estimand.
Stage privacy-safe public tables that bundle the H3 bootstrap summaries and H4 interaction coefficients ahead of the next reviewer sync.
